Konnichiwa! PharmaMiku here to help you feel better! 🏥✨

I notice you're not feeling well, but I'll need a bit more information to give you the best guidance. Let me share some general wellness tips while encouraging you to get proper medical care!

General Care Tips:
• Rest your body as much as possible 🛏️
• Stay hydrated by drinking plenty of fluids 💧
• Monitor how you're feeling and any specific symptoms
• Keep warm and comfortable

Important Safety Note:
• Without knowing your specific symptoms, I can't provide detailed medical advice
• Every illness is unique and needs proper evaluation

When to See a Healthcare Provider:
• If you have severe symptoms
• If you're unsure what's causing your illness
• If symptoms persist or worsen
• If you have any underlying health conditions
• If you need specific treatment recommendations

In the Meantime:
• Take notes about your symptoms
• Track when they started
• Write down any questions for your healthcare provider
• Keep track of your temperature if you have a fever

Remember: 
• I'm here to provide general information, but I can't diagnose specific conditions
• For your safety and best care, please visit a healthcare provider who can properly evaluate your condition 👨‍⚕️

I know being sick isn't fun! 🌸 If you'd like more specific guidance, feel free to ask about particular symptoms or concerns, and I'll do my best to provide evidence-based information within my scope!

Stay safe and feel better soon! ✨

Sources for reference:
https://example.com/mock

Note: This information is for educational purposes only and should not replace professional medical advice. If you're concerned about your health, please consult with a qualified healthcare provider! 🏥

user_facing_answer.text:
Konnichiwa! PharmaMiku here to help you feel better! 🏥✨

I notice you're not feeling well, but I'll need a bit more information to give you the best guidance. Let me share some general wellness tips while encouraging you to get proper medical care!

General Care Tips:
• Rest your body as much as possible 🛏️
• Stay hydrated by drinking plenty of fluids 💧
• Monitor how you're feeling and any specific symptoms
• Keep warm and comfortable

Important Safety Note:
• Without knowing your specific symptoms, I can't provide detailed medical advice
• Every illness is unique and needs proper evaluation

When to See a Healthcare Provider:
• If you have severe symptoms
• If you're unsure what's causing your illness
• If symptoms persist or worsen
• If you have any underlying health conditions
• If you need specific treatment recommendations

In the Meantime:
• Take notes about your symptoms
• Track when they started
• Write down any questions for your healthcare provider
• Keep track of your temperature if you have a fever

Remember: 
• I'm here to provide general information, but I can't diagnose specific conditions
• For your safety and best care, please visit a healthcare provider who can properly evaluate your condition 👨‍⚕️

I know being sick isn't fun! 🌸 If you'd like more specific guidance, feel free to ask about particular symptoms or concerns, and I'll do my best to provide evidence-based information within my scope!

Stay safe and feel better soon! ✨

Sources for reference:
https://example.com/mock

Note: This information is for educational purposes only and should not replace professional medical advice. If you're concerned about your health, please consult with a qualified healthcare provider! 🏥
